title: Pesach Haggadah

titles.text: In the Beginning Our Fathers Were Idol Worshipers
מתחילה עובדי עבודה זרה היו אבותינו

nodes.title: In the Beginning Our Fathers Were Idol Worshipers
nodes.heTitle: מתחילה עובדי עבודה זרה היו אבותינו
nodes.key: In the Beginning Our Fathers Were Idol Worshipers

enDesc: The Haggadah is the classic Jewish book used as the basis of the Passover seder. Its text was compiled during the periods of the Mishnah and the Talmud, with later medieval additions. It exists today in many forms, as different communities around the world developed their own variations.
enShortDesc: Haggadah commonly used in Ashkenazi communities.
